author: zanderdev
long_description:
You can view your playtime using the /playtime chatcommand. The tracker is per-player, not for the whole server. You can view other player's playtime using /playtime [player name]. Every hour of playtime a user gets, the playtime will get announced to the server.
The mod is compatible with all if not most games & mod(pack)s. While this mod works in minetest game it should be noted that it is meant to be used together with other mod(pack)s to keep track of or speedrun progress.
name: advancedplaytime
short_description: Keeps track of playtime for all players in your world. Notifies you how much playtime you have occasionally.
title: Advanced Playtime
